name: Ultra Mega Terminator Chicken 3000EX
description:
Ultra Mega Terminator Chicken 3000EX

It's an endless runner really. The twist is that you're a Chicken, the chicken is a Terminator Chicken since it doesn't have legs, it has tank tracks. But why? You're getting chased by a dog, not a normal dog, this dog has a jetpack and is there to kill you. How do you defend yourself? Lasers. 

Based on a true event.

Controls:

The game is still in development and has bugs. I didn't really think I'd publish this anywhere, especially on the web. Some of the bugs are on the WebGL version for some unknown reason. It works fine on Windows (downloadable files will be uploaded one day)

Code by Duka

Music by @Maja Milas

Sprites by Duka and @Tin Andonovski
